name: wQph
title: 浮いてる要素に対して dispatchEvent

js.content:
log = (txt) -> document.body.insertAdjacentHTML 'beforeend', "

#{txt}

" form = document.createElement 'form' input = document.createElement 'input' form.appendChild input form.addEventListener 'change', (e) -> log e.target.tagName , false evt = document.createEvent 'HTMLEvents' evt.initEvent 'change', true, true input.dispatchEvent evt document.body.appendChild form input.dispatchEvent evt
